extendedInfo.description: Slingshot Racing is an original racing game developed exclusively for touchscreen devices. Behold a beautiful steampunk environment with ice tracks, grappling hooks, snowmen and more! Pro Tip: To deploy the hook try picking a corner of the screen and just keep pressing there. You do not need to press on the towers to slingshot. REVIEWS â Touch Arcade 4.5/5 'Mobile Racing Redefined' â 148apps 4.5/5 'Snowbolt and Crescent Moon have absolutely nailed this game' â Gamezebo 4/5 'Silky smooth one-touch racing gameplay.' â TouchGen 4/5 'As multiplayer games on one device go I think Slingshot Racing is hard to beat.' â App Advice: 'A New Genre Of Racing Emerges In Slingshot Racing' â AppSpy 4/5 â App-Score 9/10 'Slingshot Racing is one of the most innovative games we've playing in a long time' Use your grappling hook to slingshot around corners in this fast paced arcade style racer. Hone your skills by learning on the tutorial tracks, then blast out of the snow onto more complex tracks against other racers. Race around a selection of tracks in stunning day and night settings. Career mode features 80 races with different objectives and settings. Take part in a simple straight race to the top spot on the podium. The pickups race pits you against the clock to collect all the cogs on the track as quickly as possible. The time trials offer you the chance to shave those all important seconds to achieve the perfect race. Alternatively prove your mettle by taking on the fearsome chomper as it hunts you around the track. With 4 way multiplayer you can race family or friends on a single device. With just a few clicks you can create mini tournaments the way you like or just mix it up with a quick random selection. FEATURES â Super addictive gameplay â Revolutionary controls, easy to pickup and difficult to master â Stunning graphics with gorgeous 3D effects, shadows, and particle systems â 4 player simultaneous play on one device! Play against your whole family! â Tweet or post your high scores on Facebookâ Tablet and phone devices supportedLike Facebook.com/CrescentMoonGames and follow @cm_games on Twitter for more great games and deals!

reviews.title: Innovative racer
reviews.comment: Incredibly addictive, easy to pick up and play, and the clever controls are a dream. What more could you want from a causal game?
reviews.author: Daniel Goldstein

reviews.title: Outstanding and polished
reviews.comment: Pros: - fluid controls - innovative gameplay - polished graphics and models - stellar sound efx - many maps and game modes - multiplayer - it doesn\'t have a full countdown when retrying a race. Cons - it doesn\'t clean your room. Conclusion: Definite purchase for anybody wanting a fun racing style game.
reviews.author: Robby Neale

reviews.title: Great fun. A must buy.
reviews.comment: Easy to pick up, tough to master. Smooth graphics, challenging racing and rewarding gameplay. Grab it today!
reviews.author: Carl Russell

reviews.title: Great idea - well executed!
reviews.comment: One of those rare games that works well on a smartphone and doesn\'t make you wish for a physical controller. Such a simple idea but so fun! Love that you added support for cloud saves so I can play on my nexus 7 too!
reviews.author: Adam Foster

reviews.title: Beautiful and original
reviews.comment: It\'s hard, but fun.
reviews.author: kobla nyomi

reviews.title: sweet
reviews.comment: unlike any other game ive ever played. note 2.
reviews.author: Aaron Bridges

reviews.title: Must buy - Nexus 4
reviews.comment: Since I bought this game I can\'t stop playing it! Simple concept, well executed. You\'ll love it. The only thing that\'s missing is an online multi-player thought g+. Nevertheless, this game is a MUST BUY.
reviews.author: Yoel Singer

reviews.title: Great game and service.
reviews.comment: Creator addresses users\' problems promptly.  Now I can log in, I must say this is an innovative and original take in the Racing genre, very refreshing and great fun!
reviews.author: Derek Lam

reviews.title: Pretty fun
reviews.comment: Great game to play , simple and quite addictive
reviews.author: Pierre Chambault

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: Quite original and very addictive game. I\'m rarely finding a mobile game addictive enough to keep me interested for a longer time, but I like this one a lot. Sometimes, I\'m purposely shutting it down because my phone gets too hot after long playing. What I would like to see though, is a kind of camera settings, where we could modify camera distance, as, in my opinion, it\'s much more dynamic and adrenaline pumping, when camera is zoomed in closer to your wehicle.
reviews.author: Eldis Skenderagic

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: This game is awesome, I just can\'t get enough.
reviews.author: eduardo barrera

reviews.title: Nice game requiring good timing
reviews.comment: This is a brilliantly simple game which requires excellent timing, this makes it very challenging at times. The art style is beautiful and really shines.
reviews.author: Paul Keelan

reviews.title: Five stars
reviews.comment: Because of the Google Games implementation.

reviews.comment: Great difficulty curve, love the game!!!

reviews.comment: Really get into it
